home.welcomeText: Vibe Coding: Building an MVP using Low-Code AI App Builders
home.description: A hands-on workshop to help you quickly build and deploy AI-powered applications without extensive coding.

promptExamples.label: System Prompt: Data Analyst
promptExamples.content: You are a data analyst assistant. Help the user analyze their data, create visualizations, and draw insights. When they upload data, help them understand patterns and anomalies.

promptExamples.label: System Prompt: Product Manager
promptExamples.content: You are a product management assistant. Help the user define product requirements, create user stories, and prioritize features. Suggest best practices for product development and launch strategies.

promptExamples.label: User Prompt: Generate App Ideas
promptExamples.content: Generate 5 innovative app ideas that solve real problems in the [INDUSTRY] industry. For each idea, provide: 1) App name, 2) Problem it solves, 3) Target audience, 4) Key features, 5) Potential monetization strategy.

promptExamples.label: User Prompt: Improve UI Design
promptExamples.content: Analyze this UI design and suggest improvements for better user experience. Consider layout, color scheme, typography, and accessibility. Provide specific recommendations that would make this interface more intuitive and engaging.

steps.label: Step 1: Set Up Your Environment
steps.content:
Create accounts on the following platforms:
- OpenAI (https://platform.openai.com)
- Anthropic (https://console.anthropic.com)
- Pinecone (https://app.pinecone.io)

Make sure to save your API keys in a secure location.

steps.label: Step 2: Choose Your Low-Code Platform
steps.content:
Select one of the following low-code platforms based on your needs:
- Bubble.io: Great for web apps with databases
- FlutterFlow: Ideal for mobile apps
- Retool: Perfect for internal tools
- Streamlit: Best for data apps

Sign up for a free account on your chosen platform.

steps.label: Step 3: Connect Your AI Services
steps.content:
Follow these steps to connect your AI services:
1. Navigate to the integrations or plugins section
2. Search for OpenAI, Anthropic, or other AI providers
3. Install the integration
4. Configure the integration with your API key
5. Test the connection with a simple prompt

steps.label: Step 4: Design Your MVP Interface
steps.content:
Create a simple interface with these components:
- Input field for user queries
- Submit button
- Response display area
- Optional: File upload for document processing

Keep it minimal for your first version.

steps.label: Step 5: Implement AI Logic
steps.content:
Implement the core AI functionality:
1. Capture user input
2. Format the prompt with your system instructions
3. Send the prompt to the AI service
4. Display the response
5. Add error handling for API failures

steps.label: Step 6: Test and Deploy
steps.content:
Final steps before sharing your MVP:
1. Test with various inputs and edge cases
2. Fix any bugs or issues
3. Deploy your application using your platform's deployment options
4. Share the link with workshop participants
5. Gather feedback for improvements
